issue_title: Incorrect java warning/error location in new Problems API
summary: Discussion on the potential security vulnerability in the library's encryption method and a request for a fix or workaround.
This issue refers to a workaround mentioned in another issue. The solution can be found at this link: 'For a workaround, [see this.](https://github.com/eclipse-store/store/issues/183)'

issue_title: Add support for running Gradle on Java 22
summary: An issue requesting the bot to gradle test the code and provide build status. A link is provided to see all build failures.

This pull request (PR) contains 50% new code, with the majority of changes made to the 'documentation' platform. Specifically, 9 lines were added and 9 lines were deleted in a single file. The PR does not include any changes to the 'bt_ge_build_cache', 'build_infrastructure', 'core_configuration', 'core_execution', 'core_runtime', 'extensibility', 'gradle_enterprise', 'ide', 'jvm', 'kotlin_dsl', 'release_coordination', or 'software' platforms.
Discussion on the potential security vulnerability in the library's encryption method and a request for a fix or workaround.
